column1: People with diabetes have a higher chance of having heart attacks and strokes.
Controlling blood sugar, blood pressure, and cholesterol levels are very important for preventing heart attacks and strokes.
When you have extra cholesterol in your blood, it builds up inside the walls of your heart's arteries (blood vessels).
You should learn how to take your statin medicine and how to watch for side effects.
Getting exercise will help you control your diabetes and make your heart stronger.
Some people with diabetes may have heart problems and not know it because they do not have symptoms.
